    Product Release Notes

    Below are recent product updates for July-September 2022
    If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Product Updates document.

    Video Cloud

    Feature: CMS API - delete image

    Product Area: APIs

    Date: 30-September-2022

    Description: New endpoint for deleting an image of any kind. Also removed deprecated endpoints for deleting poster and thumbnail

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: New version of AEM connector

    Product Area: Integrations

    Date: 30-September-2022

    Description: Added info on the 6.0.1 release of the connector

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Sitecore Connector

    Product Area: Integrations

    Date: 23-September-2022

    Description: Posted information about releases 10.1.2 and 10.1.3

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Major new release of AEM connector

    Product Area: CMS Connectors

    Date: 16-September-2022

    Description: Major new release for both on-premise and cloud-based AEM connector. New features include support for labels, clips, sub-folders, video scheduling, and playlist creation in AEM.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Ingest video transcripts

    Product Area: Dynamic Ingest API, Transcripts

    Date: 9-September-2022

    Description: Ingest transcripts for your videos.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: New release with support for several additional video features

    Product Area: CMS Connectors

    Date: 9-September-2022

    Description: New major release with several added features

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Gallery now offers a Virtual Event template

    Product Area: Gallery

    Date: 29-July-2022

    Description: Complete set of Gallery Virtual Event Documentation

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Image API

    Product Area: Platform APIs

    Date: 22-July-2022

    Description: The Image API allows you to retrieve a resized, cropped, or rotated version of an image. Open to Beacon customers as well as Video Cloud.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Players, Experiences, Multi-lingual Metadata

    Product Area: Sitecore Connector

    Date: 22-July-2022

    Description: Major new features including working with in-page experiences and players in Sitecore, and support for multi-lingual variants for video metadata

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Video Transcripts

    Product Area: CMS API, Playback API

    Date: 15-July-2022

    Description: New transcript file generated during auto-captioning and added to videos

    Go to Documentation

    Brightcove Player

    Feature: New skin update for Brightcove Players

    Product Area: Styling

    Date: 17-June-2022

    Description: New skin sapphire information added

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Audio only playback

    Product Area: Audio only

    Date: 29-April-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use Brightcove Player with audio-only assets.

    Go to Documentation

    Device SDKs

    Feature: Android SDK release 6.18.6

    Product Area: Native SDKs for Android

    Date: 17-June-2022

    Description: Android SDK release 6.18.6

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Native SDK for Android release 6.18.5

    Product Area: Native SDK for Android

    Date: 3-June-2022

    Description: Android SDK version 6.18.5

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Android SDK release 6.18.4

    Product Area: Native SDK for Android

    Date: 27-May-2022

    Description: Android SDK release 6.18.4

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: iOS/tvOS SDK 6.10.5

    Product Area: Native SDK for iOS

    Date: 20-May-2022

    Description: Release of iOS SDK 6.10.5

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Android SDK release 6.18.3

    Product Area: Native SDK for Android

    Date: 13-May-2022

    Description: Android SDK release version 6.18.3

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: iOS/tvOS SDK release 6.10.4

    Product Area: Native SDK for iOS

    Date: 8-April-2022

    Description: Updated for SDK release 6.10.4

    Go to Documentation

    Live

    Feature: Rollover for end of "day" cue points

    Product Area: Live API - SSAI cue points

    Date: 17-June-2022

    Description: Rollover feature to interpret cue points added within the last 10 minutes of a 24-hour period as scheduling breaks for the following 24-hour period.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Live multiple language audio tracks

    Product Area: Multiple Language Audio

    Date: 27-May-2022

    Description: Updated steps for creating multiple language audio tracks

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Deprecation of XSLT in Live SSAI Ad Configs

    Product Area: SSAI

    Date: 29-April-2022

    Description: Removed ad_configuration_transforms from schema

    Go to Documentation

    Beacon

    Feature: Push Notifications

    Product Area: Beacon Apps

    Date: 17-June-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to create and send push notifications to the viewers of your Brightcove Beacon apps.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Offline Playback with Beacon Apps

    Product Area: Offline Playback

    Date: 22-April-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to enable and use Offline Playback with your Brightcove Beacon apps.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Slates for Cloud Playout channels

    Product Area: Cloud Playout

    Date: 15-April-2022

    Description: Enhancements to slates for Cloud PLayout channels

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Set hard start time for channel content playback

    Product Area: Cloud Playout

    Date: 15-April-2022

    Description: Set the exact time for channel content playback to begin, and fill time before that with a slate asset

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Live DRM Supported on Samsung TV

    Product Area: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/display-error-messages-plugin.html

    Date: 8-April-2022

    Description: Live DRM Supported on Samsung TV

    Go to Documentation

    SSAI

    Feature: New system variable added

    Product Area: SSAI API

    Date: 3-June-2022

    Description: New system variable description added

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Set hard start time for channel content playback

    Product Area: Cloud Playout

    Date: 15-April-2022

    Description: Set the exact time for channel content playback to begin, and fill time before that with a slate asset

    Go to Documentation

    Audience Insights

    Feature: Brightcove Audience Insights - initial documentation release

    Product Area: Audience Insights

    Date: 1-April-2022

    Description: Brightcove Audience Insights provides deep insights into your viewers to help you run your business effectively

    Go to Documentation
